item.title: Blog: Revamping documentation
item.description:
We are pleased to announce that the Choco-solver site is getting a fresh start. We wish to gather under the same banner the technical documentation and the tutorials.

For this, we chose Hugo, a static site generator and Docsy, a pretty Hugo theme.

The update of the documentation is just starting, you can check the status, report errors or contribute by going to the Documentation page.

We will also transfer the tutorials to a separate page as soon as possible.

The motivated team !
